title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Initial Login
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the app on iPhone or iPad
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user taps on a game tile or mlb.tv button for a feed that is Media_On

AND

+ The user logs into a single-team account
custom_expected:
THEN

+ If the user is entitled to the feed, video playback is successful

OR

+ If the user's entitled single-team is not playing, a playback error message is displayed

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A user has logged into a single-team entitled account on iPad or iPhone
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user is navigating through the app and observing pages within Home, Scores, Watch, News, Standings, etc.
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Ad banners will not be displayed since the user is entitled to mlb.tv

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Upsell Banner on EPG
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into a single-team account
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the Games segment of the Watch tab
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLB.tv paywall banner will not be displayed

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Gameday Audio
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into a single-team account with entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ Selecting the Audio-only option on a game scoreboard from the Scores page on handset, scoreboard on Home/Team pages, or tapping on the audio-only headphones button in Gameday
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be navigated to the At Bat audio-only player 

AND

+ The user receives successful playback

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - MLB.TV Away Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ User is logged into a single-team account

AND 

+ The team the user has credentials for is the away feed in a broadcast
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches the game feed from all launch points in the app
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ The away team's broadcast will play at the initial launch

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - MLB.TV Home Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ User is logged into a single-team account

AND 

+ The team the user has credentials for is the home feed in a broadcast
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches the game feed from all launch points in the app
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ The home team's broadcast will play at the initial launch

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - MLB.TV OTTSB Switch Feeds
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ A user is logged into a single-team account with entitlements

AND

+ The user has launched a game for the team they are entitled to
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user taps to launch another game from the out-of-town scoreboard in the video player 

OR

+ The user attempts to switch to the alternate tv broadcast for the same game
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive an error message stating they are not entitled to view the broadcast

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Launching Non-entitled Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into a single-team account with entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch a game without their selected single-team playing in

AND

+ Media is live
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The feed will not playback

AND

+ The user will receive a message stating they are not entitled to viewing the game

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Gameday Highlights tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user is logged into a single-team account with entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Launching video highlights from the Gameday page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Video highlights playback as expected 

AND

+ The user is able to view VOD content for all 30 teams in Gameday and from the Watch Now carousels

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Local (In-market) Blackout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into a single-team account with entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The single-team is within the user's local market

AND

+ The user attempts to launch a game with their team playing
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A Blackout restriction message will appear at launch

AND

+ The user will be unable to watch the broadcast until 90 minutes after the game ends.

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - National Blackout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into a single-team account with entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The single-team is playing in a game that is being nationally broadcasted (ESPN)

AND

+ The user attempts to launch the national broadcast
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A Blackout restriction message will appear at launch

AND

+ The user will be unable to watch the broadcast until 90 minutes after the game ends.

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Free Game of the Day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into a single-team account with entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ There is a live or archived free game of the day available on the schedule

AND

+ The user attempts to launch the broadcast
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Video playback begins as expected

AND

+ The user does not receive a non-entitled message

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Archived Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A user is logged into a single-team account with entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch an archive game broadcast that includes their single-team
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Video playback of the single-team's TV broadcast will begin without issues
